attributes.review: So I got the app as a joke but the app is the worst I’ve ever downloaded. My friends made a better functioning app in high school. Cinnamon Hitler claims to be an expert on many things, app making isn’t one. The Chinese spyware known as TikTok is better constructed. Bunker boy is a pedo, white supremacist, homophobic, transphobic, rapist, and all in all piece of crap. Who has the vocabulary of a fourth grade. Also who is the app for? Racist boomers supporters probably can’t use a landline let alone a smartphone. And 95% of millennials and Gen Z can’t stand him. I’m just here to ruin a racist’s day. Have fun on Saturday with 0.6% of expected turnout.
attributes.title: Terrible App for a Terrible president

attributes.review: I thought this app would be amazing since the person who made it is rich af😐 I was wrong!! When I got this app I had to pay $50 and I was like “oh okay” and I still payed for it because I love my president and I would like to keep up with him BUT then it started making me pay so many things and it has A TON on notifications, at least 50 a minute. The worst thing that happened was that it took up so much GB that it deleted EVERYTHING from my phone, I wasn’t happy. If you get this app make sure you don’t. This is why I give it 1 star, I expected so much from you pelo de elote.
attributes.title: NOT WORTH THE SPACE

attributes.review: I downloaded this apps to show support to my BeLoVeD trump and get details about his campaign. But when I got it, the app froze for like an hour 🤬🤬. I un downloaded and redownloaded but it just froze. The app started glitching and sending me weird notifications. So I decided to delete but once I deleted, my phone was acting all weird and shut down outta no where. I thought maybe it died and i charged it. And it turned on, but it showed that it had 69% I noticed that my phone was full of notifications of this app even tho I deleted. I still get some. ITS THE WORST. PLEASE DONT GET THIS APP. IT WILL GLITCH YOUR PHONE.
attributes.title: WORST APP ON EARTH 😡🤬

attributes.review: This app is filled with bigly hate speech. Trump calls people names! Not good for the presidunce of the free world! America has had enough of his hateful language... he is a fascist and hates all non whites!!! Has never acknowledged the murder of George Floyd! Why? Cause in his hate filled heart he sides with the racist cop that supported his campaign! Don’t waste your time on this unless you too are a racist pig that takes the 🍊side.  He is nothing but a bag of excuses for all he has done. Hey let’s ruin the environment and take away a woman’s right to her own body!!! The man is a pig and I can’t wait till Nov 3rd!  Vote people, our lives depend on it!!!!
attributes.title: Hate filled app

attributes.review:

attributes.title: I’m gonna I was just gonna.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what everyone was talking about so I proceeded to download it as soon as I opened the app when I tell you everything in my room started flying I knew it was trouble I closed the app as soon as I was about to delete it I went to the sink and THEN I SAW A NINJA TURTLE the ninja turtle told me everything he had seen trump do so at the end of the day I was On my way!  To delete the app but I heard some nonsense about deleting tiktok. And then the ninja turtle told me he was doing this because he’s just a baby hot Cheeto. So I understood he needed to be punished as a kid so now I will join part of deleteing this app 🤳🏼
attributes.title: Scary, tragic,sad

attributes.review: If your looking for some interesting fiction to read this is a wonderful app. it kept me entertained for days but i have reason to believe it tracked my location. one foggy night i heard a knock on my door while me, my wife, and my 17 children were watching a movie. i opened it to a cockroach wearing a MAGA hat. he and about 1,000 other roaches came in and stole my whole entire family. they shoved hem them in the back of a clown car and left me alone in my home with me and my pet rat, fergalicious. its been weeks and no justice has been served. i'm absolutely devastated. great app tho💖
attributes.title: Its a Great App But it Costed Me My Family

attributes.review: I got it just to see what he is up too but I keep getting notifications on him shutting down TikTok with his is my life and on top of that my boyfriend saw that I had this and broke up with me like I was going to tell you what I was saying and I was like oh ya I know you know what I want to know you what I want to know you what I want to know you what I want to know you what I want you to say hi I know that I’m going back and you tell you that you know what I’m going through and what I’m doing you want me I know I don’t want you and your life I just don’t know how I feel sorry for that I don’t love you
attributes.title: It ruined my life

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app my phone started glitching. my camera lit up like it was recording. i know that they were watching me. all of a sudden inappropriate images appear on my screen out of no where. i did not want to see that. then i go onto my social media apps and all strange people from other counties were added as my friends. all of them were along weird questions. most recently people are trying to request me constantly on instagram. also i am getting hundreds of spam emails and phone calls a day. disgusting what this app does.
attributes.title: WORST APP IVE EVER DOWNLOADED.

attributes.review: I had a horrible experience with this app, just horrible it wouldn’t let me purchase the merchandise that I wanted to purchase and let me tell you I am a very very loyal Trump supporter but it would not let me purchase the merchandise that I wanted to get. Plus it wasn’t giving me updates on about the campaign it wasn’t giving me news resources he didn’t even tell me the policies that Trump was going to in act it didn’t give me any rallies near me it was just not good at all. I honestly think that my experience with this app has turned me into becomingA liberal, as much as I hate to say it.
attributes.title: Terrible
